item.description:
We've been offered something different to try out for a meetup

Nicks Comedy Stop in Boston is a great venue to see both up and coming comedians and some well known talent. We have been offered up to 30 tickets for Friday March 27th shows. This is free for members of the group that are 21+ and $5 for those 18 to 20.

Doors open at 7PM and show starts at 8. Best to get there early to be seated together in good seats.

Here's to hoping to see a bunch of you there. This is a great place to start off a Friday evening.

Randy
item.how_to_find_us: Use the Canada Meetup Group name at the door

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Nicks Comedy Stop
